AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.description: Discover OUILZN's story: Where Japanese precision meets Italian artistry. We craft premium denim shirts that blend sustainability with timeless style.
AboutPage.introduction: ✨ Welcome to OUILZN. We believe exceptional denim is more than fabric—it's a commitment to quality and sustainability. Born from a passion for authentic craftsmanship, we source the finest Okayama denim from Japan and combine it with traditional Italian tailoring techniques. Each shirt is meticulously crafted to last a lifetime. From casual weekends to refined occasions, OUILZN shirts are designed for the modern individual who values both style and substance.

HomePage.title: OUILZN - Premium Denim Shirts | Japanese Fabric Meets Italian Craftsmanship
HomePage.description: OUILZN crafts premium denim shirts combining Japanese Okayama denim with traditional Italian techniques. Sustainable, timeless, and made for the modern individual. Discover authentic denim excellence.

hero.title: Timeless Denim Shirts, Crafted to Perfection
hero.description: OUILZN combines the finest Japanese Okayama denim with traditional Italian tailoring. Each shirt is meticulously crafted using sustainable practices, designed to last a lifetime. More than just a shirt—it's a commitment to quality and style.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: From selection to delivery, we make finding your perfect denim shirt simple and enjoyable.

step1.title: Choose Your Style
step1.description: Browse our curated collection of premium denim shirts. Each design is crafted with attention to detail and timeless appeal.

step2.title: Expert Consultation
step2.description: Need help? Our style advisors are here to guide you in finding the perfect fit and style for your needs.

step3.title: Enjoy for Life
step3.description: Receive your shirt with premium packaging. Enjoy lifetime care support and sustainable quality that lasts.

features.title: Why Choose OUILZN
features.description: We combine the world's finest materials with time-honored techniques to create denim shirts that stand the test of time.

feature1.title: Premium Japanese Denim
feature1.description: Sourced from Okayama, Japan's denim capital. Our fabric is woven on traditional shuttle looms, creating a unique texture and exceptional durability that improves with age.

feature2.title: Italian Tailoring Excellence
feature2.description: Each shirt is crafted using traditional Italian tailoring methods passed down through generations. Precision cutting, hand-finished details, and meticulous quality control ensure perfection.

feature3.title: Sustainable & Ethical
feature3.description: We use eco-friendly dyes, sustainable production methods, and offer lifetime care services. Quality that lasts reduces waste and honors our commitment to the planet.

showcase.title: Featured Collection
showcase.description: Explore OUILZN's carefully crafted denim collection. Each piece combines premium Japanese fabrics with traditional Italian craftsmanship, showcasing the perfect blend of classic and contemporary style.

useCases.title: Versatile Style for Every Occasion
useCases.description: From the office to weekend adventures, OUILZN denim shirts adapt to your lifestyle with effortless style.

marketing.title: Professional
marketing.description: Perfect for the modern workplace. Our refined denim shirts pair beautifully with blazers and chinos, offering a sophisticated alternative to traditional dress shirts.

education.title: Casual
education.description: Weekend ready. Layer over a tee or wear solo for relaxed outings. The premium denim elevates any casual look with authentic style.

content.title: Smart Casual
content.description: Ideal for dinners, events, and social gatherings. Strike the perfect balance between polished and relaxed with timeless denim craftsmanship.

newsletter.title: Join the OUILZN Community
newsletter.description: Get exclusive access to new collections, styling tips, and special offers. Join 5,000+ denim enthusiasts.
newsletter.disclaimer: Unsubscribe anytime. We respect your privacy.

stats.title: Trusted Worldwide
stats.subtitle: OUILZN delivers premium denim shirts to customers around the globe

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you

item-1.question: What makes OUILZN denim shirts special?
item-1.answer: We use premium Japanese Okayama denim woven on traditional shuttle looms, combined with Italian tailoring techniques. Each shirt is crafted with sustainable practices and designed to last a lifetime.

item-2.question: How do I find the right size?
item-2.answer: Check our detailed size guide with measurements for chest, shoulders, and sleeve length. If the fit isn't perfect, we offer free exchanges within 30 days.

item-3.question: Are your shirts sustainable?
item-3.answer: Yes! We use eco-friendly dyes, sustainable production methods, and offer lifetime care services. Quality that lasts reduces waste and honors our commitment to the planet.

item-4.question: How should I care for my denim shirt?
item-4.answer: Wash inside out in cold water, air dry when possible. The denim will develop a unique patina over time. We also offer lifetime care support for repairs and maintenance.

item-5.question: What is your return policy?
item-5.answer: Unworn items with tags can be returned within 30 days for a full refund. We provide prepaid return labels. Contact us at support@ouilzn.shop for assistance.

testimonials.title: Real Customer Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Authentic feedback from 5,000+ satisfied customers worldwide

item-1.name: Michael Chen
item-1.content: The quality of OUILZN shirts is exceptional. The Japanese denim has a unique texture that gets better with every wear. Worth every penny.

item-2.name: Sarah Williams
item-2.content: I appreciate the attention to detail and sustainable practices. The Italian craftsmanship is evident in every stitch. This is my go-to shirt for both work and weekends.

item-3.name: David Martinez
item-3.content: Finally, a denim shirt that looks professional enough for meetings yet casual enough for coffee. The fit is perfect and the quality is outstanding.

item-4.name: Emma Thompson
item-4.content: OUILZN combines timeless style with modern sustainability. The Okayama denim is the finest I've ever worn. A must-have for any wardrobe.

item-5.name: James Park
item-5.content: As someone who values quality and durability, OUILZN delivers. The shirt has become my daily uniform. Comfortable, stylish, and built to last.

item-6.name: Sophie Laurent
item-6.content: The craftsmanship is impeccable. You can feel the quality in the fabric and see it in the details. OUILZN has redefined what a denim shirt should be.

item-7.name: Alex Rodriguez
item-7.content: I've been searching for the perfect denim shirt for years. OUILZN exceeded my expectations. The sustainable approach is a bonus I truly appreciate.

item-8.name: Lisa Anderson
item-8.content: OUILZN shirts keep me looking professional at work. Exceptional quality, perfect details, and a wardrobe essential.
